title: Allow class of CollectionsHandler and InfoHandler to be specified in solr.xml
description:
Currently, you can specify the CoreAdminHandler class name in solr.xml, but not the CollectionsHandler nor the InfoHandler.

I want to run some (access control) checks around the administrative commands.  I can do this with the CoreAdminHandler, but not the other two.

comments.author: Gregory Chanan
comments.content: Here's a patch against trunk that implements this.

comments.content: Here's a slightly amended patch, with an added test.
